instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00165 no boot/chime
threads.message:
board  delays to turn on, once fan spins it will spin for about 5 seconds then stop and spin a second time and stay on.
no image on display, no chime, no image when connected to external, cpu gets hot and when connecting a usb mouse it has power i thought it was bios but nothing changed after replacing.

only clue i had to go on was jtag connector was badly damaged and corroded along with some test points next to it. removed it and tested some of the resistors that connect to bios everything gave proper readings and no traces have been blown.

any ideas?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00165 no boot/chime
threads.message: Crap under SMC or damaged traces/resistors to U6100. I assume you removed J6100

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00165 no boot/chime
threads.message: yes removed j6100 and yes blown traces were the issue. fixed!
